document_data.name: Lherzona Ludwakazar
document_data.home: [[Earthspur Mountains]]{{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|13}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Lherzona Ludwakazar''' ({{Pronounce|LUR|zohn|ah|_|lud|WAK|ah|zah|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|36}}}}) was a [[dwarf]] of the [[Ludwakazar]] clan in the [[Earthspur Mountains]] in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.History:
Lherzona lived with her father King [[Iorn Ludwakazar]] and the rest of her clan in the [[Earthspur Mountains]], acting as custodians of the mystical [[Chamber of Falling Stones]].

However, after mining excavations, a [[medusa]] and her [[gargoyle]]s minions took control of the Chamber. In a battle, King Iorn was mortally wounded. Lherzona and the others remained to await the death of Iorn, guarding against intruders, until an adventuring party hired to clear the mine arrived.{{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|13}} After the adventurers solved the matter, Iorn finally died and Lherzona was crowned queen of her people.{{Cite adventurers league/Mayhem in the Earthspur Mines|21}}
